comments.author: Coral Roper

captions.text:
>>I AM REALLY LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS.
>>OH IS THIS YOUR FIRST?

>>YES, IT'S A BOY.
>>OH, THIS IS MY SECOND.

YOU ARE REALLY GOING TO ENJOY THIS.
THESE LAMAZE CLASSES, THEY'RE A REALLY GOOD

WAY TO BUILD YOUR CONFIDENCE
AND THE WOMAN WHO
TEACHES THEM SHE IS WONDERFUL.

>>OH, GOOD I FEEL BETTER ALREADY.
>>ALL RIGHT MOTHERS.

I AM MR. ECKLESTONE YOUR LAMAZE
INSTRUCTOR AND CERTIFIED MIDWIFE.

LET US BEGIN.
PLEASE FIND A BIRTHING BALL TO REST YOUR

IMPREGNATED BODIES UPON.
>>UH, MR.ECKELSTONE DO YOU KNOW WHERE THELMA

IS?
THE WOMAN WHO NORMALLY TEACHES THIS CLASS?

I HOPE SHE'S NOT--
>>DEAD?

>>GOODNESS, NO.
I WAS GOING TO SAY SICK.

>>OH.
WELL YOU SHOULD HAVE GUESSED DEAD.

NOW THEN, I HAVE BEEN PRESENT FOR
THE BIRTH OF 136 BABIES.

MOST OF THEM HUMAN.
I CAN TELL YOU WITHOUT RESERVATION THAT ALL

NEWBORNS ARE PRECIOUS, INNOCENT
CREATURES THAT

ARE SURPRISINGLY UGLY.
I TELL YOU THIS SO THAT YOU WILL NOT BE ALARMED

WHEN THE NURSE HANDS YOU YOUR
CHILD AND YOU REALIZE

THAT IT'S FACE LOOKS REMARKABLY
SIMILAR TO MY

OWN.
MOTHERS, LOOK AT MY FACE AND PREPARE YOURSELVES.

DRINK IT IN.
>>UH, MR. ECKLESTONE, I'M NOT SURE THIS

IS PREPARING US FOR CHILD--
>>NOTHING CAN PREPARE

YOU FOR
THE BATTLE THAT IS CHILDBIRTH.

UNLESS OF COURSE YOU'VE GIVEN
BIRTH BEFORE OR HAVE BEEN

REPEATEDLY KICKED IN THE STOMACH
BY A KANGAROO WHILST

SIMULTANEOUSLY VOMITING.
HOWEVER, IN ORDER TO HELP EASE A TINY PORTION

OF THE
ALL-CONSUMING EARTH-SHATTERING PAIN THAT AWAITS

YOU,
TRY BOUNCING ON THE BIRTHING BALL.

THE GENTLE REPETITIOUS MOVEMENT
HAS A CALMING EFFECT,

AND IT'S SIGNALS TO THE BABY THAT IT
NEEDS TO

GET OUT OF YOUR WOMB.
YOU CAN ALSO TRY THE FIGURE EIGHT.

KEEP THE HIPS LOOSE.
THESE MOTIONS HAVE ALSO BEEN KNOWN TO INDUCE

LABOR AS WELL SO BE CAREFUL THAT YOU--
>>OW!

MY WATER BROKE!
>>WHAT DID I JUST SAY?

>>SORRY IT JUST HAPPENED!
>>SO BE IT.

YOU'RE ALL ABOUT TO RECEIVE A
CRASH COURSE IN CHILDBIRTH.

THIS MUSIC SHOULD HELP SET THE TONE.
PREPARE YOURSELVES LADIES, FOR WE ARE NOW
ON THE HIGHWAY TO THE DANGER ZONE.

YOU, I NEED FRESH TOWELS,
HOT WATER AND FIVE GALLONS

OF ANYTHING THAT HAS HIGH
FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP. GO!

>>OKAY, SHOULDN'T WE GET HER TO A HOSPITAL--
>>HOSPITAL YOU SAY?

WHY DON'T WE JUST THROW THIS
POOR WOMAN INTO A PETRI

DISH WITH THE EBOLA VIRUS?
HOSPITALS ARE THE BEACH RESORTS OF THE GERM

WORLD AND NEWBORN
BABIES ARE HAPPY HOUR.

WE'LL NOT SET FOOT IN SUCH A PLACE.
>>OW!

OKAY THIS HAPPENING.
>>GET HER ONTO THE MAT AND THEN STERILIZE

YOUR HANDS BECAUSE I NEED
YOU TO CATCH THE BABY WHEN
IT COMES SHOOTING OUT OF THIS WOMAN.

>>WHAT?
WHY CAN'T YOU DO IT?

>>WHY CAN'T I?
DOES IT LOOK LIKE THIS HAND IS GOING TO CATCH

ANY BABIES?
THE POOR CHILD WOULD SLIP RIGHT THROUGH THESE

LIFELESS
FINGERS LIKE A WET FISH.

BESIDES, WHEN THIS BABY COMES INTO
THE WORLD THE FIRST THING IT SEES SHOULD NOT

BE MY FACE.
>>I'VE GOT EVERYTHING.

>>EXCELLENT.
KEEP HER HYDRATED AND RUB HER SHOULDERS.

WE NEED TO KEEP HER CALM OR SHE
WILL LIKELY KILL US ALL.

[SCREECHING]
>>IT HURTS!

>>GRIT YOUR TEETH AND DIG DEEPER, WOMAN.
THE AD HOC WOMEN AFRICA GIVE BIRTH IN THE

BUSHES BY THEMSELVES OFTEN
WHILE FIGHTING OFF LIONS!

[SCREAMING] >>SHE'S STILL IN A LOT OF--
>>PAIN?

OF COURSE SHE IS!
YOU TRY PUSHING A SCREAMING WATERMELON OUT

OF YOUR BODY
AND TELL ME HOW IT FEELS.

I CAN HELP EASE HER SUFFERING WITH
A RUDIMENTARY POULTICE

MADE FROM MUD AND FIG LEAVES.
IT MUST BE APPLIED TO THE FACE.

HOLD STILL.
>>OH.

OH!
>>HOLD STILL WOMAN!

THIS POULTICE CAN'T BE INGESTED
OR YOUR BRAIN

WILL LEAK OUT OF YOUR EARS.
>>I CAN SEE THE HEAD.

>>BRACE YOURSELVES AND GET THE TOWELS.
IT'S ABOUT TO LOOK LIKE VIETNAM IN HERE.

>>I NEED SOMETHING TO SQUEEZE.
>>HERE TAKE MY HAND!

>>OH!
>>AH!

OW!
>>STAND ASIDE WOMAN.

HERE.
>>[SCREAMING] >>NOW PUSH!

>>[SCREAMING] [BABY CRYING]
>>HE'S PERFECT.

>>YOU'RE AMAZING.
>>THANK YOU.

WELL LITTLE MAN YOU ARE NUMBER 137.
CONGRATULATIONS.

HERE IS MY CONTACT INFORMATION.
WHEN HE'S OLD ENOUGH TO LEARN HOW TO DRIVE,
CALL ME.
